column5: It seems this fall has been exceptional for fall steelies.  Is it the rain we have had?    Thinking of fishing the rivers again, I quit about 10 years ago because I couldnt take the crowds and the idiots. Maybe its time to start going again.   Are most of the salmon slaughters gone yet?      Darren
Was out today for most of the day Salmon are gone,  Saw a hand full of half dead chinooks swimming around and a few cohos landed, but the crowds are definitely gone.
